channel.title: Github Pages on Adam Knox
channel.description: Recent content in Github Pages on Adam Knox

item.title: Hosting a TiddlyWiki on GitHub pages
item.description: These days we have so much information being thrown at us from all directions that it’s hard to figure out what to do with it. I decided to try hosting an encrypted tiddlywiki with github pages for organizing my life, read on to find out how it’s gone.

item.title: Hosting a Static Site with Hugo
item.description: Dynamic sites are all the rage these days, but static sites have their own advantages. I decided to try out Hugo to generate this one, and this is what I learned.
